A

ActionEvent - Class in jcurses.event
Instances of this class are generated by widgets if an user makes an action, for example pushes a button or selects a menu item.
ActionEvent(Widget) - Constructor for class jcurses.event.ActionEvent
 
ActionListener - Interface in jcurses.event
The interface has to be implemented to listen on instances of ActionEvent
ActionListenerManager - Class in jcurses.event
This class implements a listener manager to manage jcurses.event.ActionEvent instances and listener on these.

GridLayoutManager - Class in jcurses.widgets
This class is a layout manager that works like as the DefaultLayoutManager with an difference: the painting rectangle is shared in many grid cells and the constraints are stated not in real coodinates on the painting rectangle, but in 'grid-coordinates'
